auth.title: Eryxon MES
auth.subtitle: Manufacturing Execution System
auth.signInDescription: Sign in to access your manufacturing dashboard and track jobs, operations, and your shop floor in real-time.
auth.signUpDescription: Request access to Eryxon Flow. Create your company account and get started once approved.
auth.noAccount: Don't have an account? Request access
auth.haveAccount: Already have an account? Sign in
auth.emailConsent: , and consent to receive service-related emails (account notifications, updates, and important announcements).
auth.gdprNotice: By creating an account, you acknowledge that your data will be processed in accordance with GDPR regulations. You can export or delete your data at any time from your account settings.
auth.mustAgreeToTerms: You must agree to the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service to create an account.
auth.checkEmail: Check your email to confirm your account
auth.pendingApprovalMessage: Your account has been created and is pending approval. You will receive an email once your account has been activated by our team.
auth.comingSoonNotice: Eryxon Flow is launching soon. Request access now to be notified when your account is ready.

gdpr.title: Data Deletion (GDPR)
gdpr.description: Permanently delete your account or entire organization data

deleteAccount.title: Delete My Account
deleteAccount.description: Permanently delete your user account and all associated personal data.
deleteAccount.warningMessage: This action cannot be undone. Your account, time entries, assignments, and issues will be permanently deleted.
deleteAccount.confirmMessage: This will permanently delete your account and all associated data:
deleteAccount.confirmDescription: You will be immediately signed out and will not be able to recover your account.

deleteTenant.title: Delete Entire Organization
deleteTenant.description: Permanently delete your organization and ALL data for all users.
deleteTenant.warningMessage: This will delete ALL jobs, parts, operations, users, and data for your entire organization. This action affects ALL users in your organization and CANNOT be undone.
deleteTenant.confirmMessage: This will permanently delete your organization and ALL data:
deleteTenant.confirmWarningMessage: This will delete data for ALL users in your organization. Everyone will lose access. This action is PERMANENT and CANNOT be undone.

shipping.title: Shipping Management
shipping.subtitle: Group completed jobs into shipments, assign vehicles, and track deliveries
shipping.createShipmentDescription: Create a new shipment to group completed jobs for delivery.
shipping.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this shipment?
shipping.noShipmentsFound: No shipments found. Create your first shipment to get started.
shipping.routeNotesPlaceholder: Special delivery instructions, access codes, etc.
shipping.shipmentNameDesc: Optional friendly name for this shipment
shipping.searchJobs: Search by job number, customer, or location...
shipping.noJobsAvailable: No completed jobs available for shipping.
shipping.completeJobsFirst: Complete some jobs to assign them to shipments.
shipping.noJobsAssigned: No jobs assigned to this shipment yet.
shipping.confirmRemoveJob: Remove this job from the shipment?
shipping.noJobsReadyDesc: Complete manufacturing jobs to see them here. Jobs with delivery addresses will be grouped by postal code for efficient shipping.
shipping.addPostalCodeTip: Add delivery postal codes to your jobs when creating them to enable automatic location-based grouping.
shipping.howToUseDescription: A complete guide to managing shipments and deliveries
shipping.step1Desc: First, complete your manufacturing jobs. Only completed jobs can be assigned to shipments.
shipping.step2Desc: Go to the "Ready to Ship" tab to see completed jobs grouped by postal code. This helps you batch deliveries efficiently.
shipping.step3Desc: Click "Create Shipment" to set up a new delivery. Specify the vehicle type, schedule, and destination details.
shipping.step4Desc: Select completed jobs to include in the shipment. Monitor weight and volume to optimize vehicle capacity.
shipping.step5Desc: Update shipment status as it progresses: Draft â†’ Planned â†’ Loading â†’ In Transit â†’ Delivered.
shipping.tipContent: Add delivery postal codes to your jobs when creating them. This enables automatic grouping by location for more efficient route planning.
